Original:
朋友的口袋名單
（直接放進自己口袋）
深藏仁愛路三段蛋黃區中的蛋黃中央
神秘的地下室藏著一家空間寬廣
環境與氣氛深得我心
座位寬敞  配色暗深  質感高雅的live house
還是自己最喜歡的其中之一Piano bar
所有Waiter Waitress服務都周到
雖然有一位年輕小哥酒品介紹錯誤
不過不影響整個體驗
服務人員的真實也讓人滿意
告知我們餐廳的人員之後會換
跟我們抱歉menu上沒有的餐點
雖然這麼說但馬告手工香腸個人覺得令人滿意（很鹹味道重口味且辣度以一般人來說是夠的）
薯條盆栽跟烤花椰菜是稍微失望沒錯啦
不過除此之外的酒類都很好
Bartender調的酒令人滿意
在愛爾蘭待過的我能喝到愛爾蘭咖啡調酒
讓我憶起滿滿的回憶…
Piano live performer so chill（非貶意）
價格在這地段也蠻合理
總結整體下來  是我默默的放進自己口袋的店
很喜歡  我一定會再來

(Put directly into your pocket)
The center of the egg yolk area in the three -stage egg yolk area of ​​Shenzhen

The environment and atmosphere win my heart
Live House with a spacious color matching color and elegant texture
Still one of your favorite Piano Bar
All Waiter Waitress services are thoughtful
Although there is a young little brother's wine introduction error
But it does not affect the entire experience
The truth of the service staff is also satisfactory
I will tell us the restaurant will be changed after
Sorry to us meals that I don't have
Although so, Ma Juan's handmade sausage personally feels satisfactory (very salty and heavy, spicy and spicy. It is enough for ordinary people).
French fries and grilled broccoli are a little disappointed.
But the alcohol is very good
Bartender tuned wine is satisfactory
I can drink Irish coffee bartending in Ireland
Let me remember full of memories ...
Piano Live Performer so Chill (non -derogatory)
The price is quite reasonable in this area
To sum up, the overall is the shop I silently put in my pocket
I like it very much, I will come again

Original:
朋友在這辦party，覺得不算是特別超值，換酒是使用酒券的方式，但喝開了其實很難保存那個券啦😅😅個人是覺得這方式不太合適

Friends are doing party here, and I feel that it is not particularly value -for -money. Change of wine is the way to use wine coupons, but it is actually difficult to save that coupon when drinking. I personally think that this method is not suitable
The food part is generally too oily. It is not very delicious. Niu Lat's eyes are very greasy to put on the duck liver above. It is not very good to eat a bite; fried chicken skin is also good and good; You have to eat all the fries above the upper fans ~ It is a bit hard; but there is a meal of about $ 1380 with a lobster scallop.

Original: 店內裝潢很優雅，除了餐點調酒外，還有現場live鋼琴表演，氣氛不錯，炸物不錯吃，但就是調酒出餐的時間較久，味道順但記憶點較少，但這裡是一個可以好好享受味道的地方。

Original:
日期：2023/3/11
主題：朋友深夜10:30pm喝一杯
人數：3大

老闆是設計師，對於光影的設計很專業，利用不同的投影方式，營造店內的lounge氣氛，很舒適。

是書店改造，所以店內有濃濃的文藝氣息，我座位旁邊就是一大本Doir的書籍📚

現場有鋼琴演奏 🎹，如果想要聊天的話，不能坐太近，因為音效很好超大聲的。

最驚豔的是他的奶茶和調酒，每一杯都像藝術品一樣，杯墊都是書本造型。冰奶茶有夠好喝，是用法國的鮮奶油打的奶泡，完全跳脫對奶茶的印象，可惜好小杯不夠喝啊。

還有愛爾蘭咖啡也是一個絕，在你身邊將法國奶泡倒入，要一大口從奶泡喝到最深的咖啡，又甜又帶苦。

調酒師是超可愛的小女生，小小隻笑起來好可愛，中英文都很好，自己發明的奶泡shoot超級好喝，完全喝不到酒味

因為是去年2022年10月才開幕，是還沒有被發現的私藏地，私心希望能不用預約隨時去都有位子！

————
飼養雙寶男孩的上班族兼老媽子，以親子活動、台北美食、海外旅遊為主的分享。廢言不多以條例式撰文，喜歡我分享風格的歡迎追蹤
EN:
Date: 2023/3/11
Subject: Friends Late Night 10:30 PM Drink a drink
Number of people: 3 major

The boss is a designer. He is very professional for the design of light and shadow. He uses different projection methods to create the Lounge atmosphere in the store, which is very comfortable.

It is a bookstore renovation, so there is a strong artistic atmosphere in the store. Next to my seat is a large book DOIR book 📚

There is a piano performance at the scene. If you want to chat, you can't sit too close, because the sound effect is very good.

The most amazing thing is that his milk tea and bartender are like artworks.Ice milk tea is delicious enough. It is a milk foam used to use French cream, which is completely out of the impression of milk tea. Unfortunately, it is not enough to drink a small cup.

Also, Ireland coffee is also a must. Pour French milk beside you. It is sweet and bitter from the milk brewing to the deepest coffee.

The bartender is a super cute little girl. The little laughed is very cute, and the Chinese and English are very good.

Because it was only opened in October 2022 last year, it was a private land that has not been discovered. I hope that there will be a child at any time not to make an appointment at any time!

————————
The office workers and mother of the two -treasure boy are mainly shared by parent -child activities, Taipei food, and overseas tourism.I do n’t write more nonsense in the regulations. I like my sharing style. Welcome to track

Original:
如果想體驗被當賤民對待的感覺～非常推薦大家來這間酒吧^ _ ^

2022/3/24晚上和朋友因緣際會下來到這間酒吧

因爲是週四晚上所以場內人不多 不過氣氛很不錯、還有現場樂手 就順勢拿起手機～想說錄ㄧ段現場的氛圍跟環境～

誰知道才剛錄不到三秒鐘 鄰桌男性客人突然指著我大叫並生氣拍桌，以茶壺姿勢質問我憑什麼拍他（重點是我根本沒有在拍他🤦🏼‍♀️）

雖然被罵得很莫名但我也馬上就停止錄影 只是沒想到緊坐男士身旁的神秘女子立刻走到我身邊 命令我把剛剛錄的影片在她面前刪掉，說她的”老闆”是不給錄影的，還頤指氣使的要我把所有的相簿都秀給她看

我真的覺得超莫名其妙🤷‍♀️
我根本不認識這些路人甲乙丙也不是針對他們而錄影，要求我把影片刪掉我也是照做（奴性是有多重🤦🏼‍♀️）神秘女子口中的”老闆”卻還是不死心對著我咆嘯

重點來了，一般店家面對客人起爭執 通常會馬上前來制止或是主動了解事情來龍去脈 奇葩的是這間酒吧的服務員完！全！漠！視！ 讓我無辜地被這位神秘老闆罵了5分鐘（比被自己老闆罵還不爽

待神秘女子回到座位後又過了大概兩分鐘吧，女服務員才偷偷摸摸的來到我身旁”關切”  ～不過沒有要賠不是哦，只是很小聲的說 ”噢..不好意思， 對面那個客人喝多了”

雖然說一樣米養百種人，但是這麼莫名的經驗我也是第一次遇到；也是第一次遇到這麼姑息客人行為的店家。如果這位”老闆”真的是你們的大戶，為什麼不直接做私人酒吧呢？到底是什麼樣的店家會放任客人在坐下不到5分鐘就莫名的被別的客人罵的狗血淋頭而且置之不理呢？
實在是太無解了，也因此完全失去想和朋友喝酒聽音樂的興緻。

在走出酒吧的那一刻，只能安慰自己：雖然衰小到爆 至少可以用自身經驗提醒無知大眾：小心踩雷啊！！！

台北好酒吧多的是～真的不需要來到一間低消$600 服務態度卻差到讓人心寒的鬼地方🤦🏼‍♀️
EN:
If you want to experience the feeling of being treated as a bitch ~ I recommend everyone to come to this bar^_^

2022/3/24 The evening with friends will come down to this bar

Because there are not many people in the field on Thursday night, but the atmosphere is very good, and the scene musicians will take the mobile phone with the opportunity ~ I want to say that the atmosphere and environment of the ㄧ ㄧ ㄧ ㄧ ㄧ

Who knows that the male guest of the neighboring table at the neighboring table suddenly pointed at me and shouted at the table in a teapot.

Although I was scolded inexplicably, I stopped the video immediately. I didn't expect the mysterious woman next to the men to walk to me immediately to order me to delete the video I just recorded in front of her. For the recording, I was still angry and asked me to show her all the albums

I really think it's super inexplicable 莫️
I don't know these passers -by, A, Bing, is not a videos of them. I asked me to delete the film. Scream

At the point, the general stores are usually coming to stop or take the initiative to understand the ins and out of the bar. The waiter of this bar is finished!Complete!desert!See!It made me innocently scolded by this mysterious boss for 5 minutes (I was unhappy than being scolded by my own boss

After the mysterious woman returned to the seat for about two minutes, it took about two minutes, and the female waiter secretly came to me "concerned" ~ But I didn't have to pay, but just whispered "Oh ... I'm sorry, the guest opposite the opposite side of the guests on the opposite side Drink too much "

Although I have raised hundreds of people, I have also encountered such an inexplicable experience; it is also the first time that I have encountered such a lot of guest behaviors.If this "boss" is really your big family, why not make a private bar directly?What kind of shop will let the guests have a dog blood that is inexplicably scolded by other guests and ignore it in less than 5 minutes?
It is too unsolvable, so I completely lost my interest in drinking with friends and listening to music.

At the moment of walking out of the bar, you can only comfort yourself: although it is too small to explode, you can use your own experience to remind ignorance Volkswagen: Be careful to step on the lightning!IntersectionIntersection

There are more in Taipei good bars ~ I really do n’t need to come to a low -time $ 600 service attitude, but the cold -hearted ghost place 🤦🏼‍♀️

Original: 煙燻愛爾蘭，真的很有層次，醇厚的咖啡與酒，再配上肖楠木的煙燻香氣，我超愛的，激推各位來嚐嚐！
EN: Smoked Ireland, really layered, mellow coffee and wine, coupled with Xiao Nanmu's smoky aroma, I love it, inspire everyone to try it!

Original: 來這裡之前其實都不怎麼喝調酒，因為在外面喝到的都覺得很一般不然就是味道奇怪或是味道太集中，很難喝，所以對調酒的印象其實不太好，但這裡讓我改變了這些想法，每一杯調酒看似簡單其實裡面藏了很多小細節，魔鬼藏在細節裡，要把每一杯的細節處理到位，還要互相堆疊不衝突，才能形成完美的調酒，除了調酒這裡的手沖咖啡和SOE拿鐵也是非常好喝，除了豆子品質很好之外，還可以萃取出很多層次的風味，來這裡不管是聚會，還是聊天甚至是享受一個人的時光都非常適合。
EN: I do n’t have much drinking bartending before I came here, because I feel that it ’s generally that the taste is strange or the taste is too concentrated, so it’ s not good to drink. After these ideas, each cup of bartending seems simple. In fact, there are many small details hidden in it. The devil is hidden in the details. The details of each cup must be handled in place. Hand coffee and SOE latte here are also very delicious. In addition to the good quality of beans, you can also extract a lot of layers of flavor. Whether it is a party, or chatting or even enjoying a person's time, it is very suitable. Essence
